name: Prominence Poker
description: Welcome to Prominence Poker, a game that pits players from around the world against each other--and devious AI--to build the rep, prestige, and bankroll needed to be, and beat, the best of the best.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up (64 bit only) Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD equivalent GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up (64 bit only) Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD equivalent GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
